qas.question: How many square miles is Oklahoma City?
Out of the 620.34 square miles, how much of it is water?

context: According to the United States Census Bureau, the city has a total area of <a0_0>620.34 square miles<a0_0/> (1,606.7 km2), of which, 601.11 square miles (1,556.9 km2) of it is land and <a1_0>19.23 square miles<a1_0/> (49.8 km2) of it is water. The total area is 3.09 percent water.
